# Tyler Schwenk Technical LLC - Website Project

## Project Overview
Professional Next.js website for Tyler Schwenk Technical LLC, a full-stack software development business specializing in bioacoustics and machine learning.

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 14+ with App Router
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- React

## Project Structure
- App Router-based architecture
- Component-based design
- Responsive, mobile-first approach

## Development Guidelines
- Use TypeScript for all files
- Follow Next.js best practices
- Maintain responsive design
- Keep code clean and documented
